channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The other election night winner: Perplexity
item.description: On Tuesday, two AI startups tried convincing the world their AI chatbots were good enough to be an accurate, real-time source of information during a ...

item.title: The Manosphere Won
item.description: Donald Trump owes at least part of his victory to the manosphere—the amorphous assortment of influencers who are mostly young, exclusively male, and i...

item.title: States’ Abortion Rights Wins May Be Short-Lived Under a Second Trump Term
item.description: More than two years after a historic Supreme Court decision ended the national right to an abortion, some states are fighting back—but the future of a...

item.title: OpenAI acquired Chat.com
item.description: OpenAI bought Chat.com, adding to its collection of high-profile domain names. As of this morning, Chat.com now redirects to OpenAI’s AI-powered chatb...

item.title: Pinstripe wants to redefine the way online sellers sell secondhand clothing
item.description: Pinstripe aims to reimagine the secondhand market by offering sellers the opportunity to have both a digital storefront and a physical retail presence...

item.title: Perplexity Dove Into Real-Time Election Tracking While Other AI Companies Held Back
item.description: The controversial AI search engine, accused of aggressively scraping content, went all in on providing AI-generated election information.

item.title: The Election Was Even Weirder in VR
item.description: Users donned their virtual avatars and took to services like Horizon Worlds and VRChat to celebrate or bemoan the election. It was chaos.

item.title: What Trump’s win might mean for Elon Musk
